Author: akselovite
Title: [ANN][PREICO] THE FIRST VR PLATFORM FOR BUSINESS ON BLOCKCHAIN | Viarium
Body: Thank you for your support! Viarium has more advantages in which you might be interested:  Users get instant access to hundreds of thousands of goods either from home or a Viarium ‚Äúislet‚Äù at physical access points throughout the world. Customers can pay for goods both with internal VRX platform tokens or fiat money*. In the future, the VR technologies will ensure tactile sensations in virtual space. Businesses have their lease, payroll, logistics and tax costs reduced, and save time while increasing traffic. No space limits exist in a virtual world. Thus the platform users are spared from excessive autocratic costs such as commercial cargo customs clearance or entry visas for traveling abroad. Customers can satisfy their demand for products from any point worldwide while saving their money and time. Business owners can increase net profit by reducing their costs. The customer base will grow due to access to a wider consumer audience. Users will be able to enjoy noncommercial goods such as for example, objects of art, in any corner of the world. People will be able to share their inventions, collectors‚Äô goods and other items in the comfort of their home.

Title: [ANN][PREICO] THE FIRST VR PLATFORM FOR BUSINESS ON BLOCKCHAIN | Viarium

Author: Viarium.io
Title: [ANN][PREICO] THE FIRST VR PLATFORM FOR BUSINESS ON BLOCKCHAIN | Viarium
Body: Dear investors!  Thank you for your trust in our project. We currently receive a big number of financial offers from major venture investors. After long negotiations, we are happy to announce the cooperation with a new big partner. Due to the current situation on the cryptocurrency market and project‚Äôs re-focusing on the Asian market, we are forced to postpone the token sale. Dates of pre-sale from 01.06.18 to 14.07.18 and of token sale 01.08.18 - 31.08.18. Additional time will be required to finalize legal aspects of the project in accordance with new requirements for organizations attracting investments through the token sale. Thanks to fresh investments, we are elaborating the marketing campaign. We are also adding new presentations at the world's leading blockchain events. We will issue the announcement of upcoming roadshows by 15.04.18. To compensate these adjustments, we reward 50% of tokens to all existing investments. Balance change will occur before 15.04.18 We also understand the decision to restore investments. You can state this desire in the reply letter and we will contact you in the shortest time possible.  Yours sincerely, Alexey Mashkeev Founder Viarium

Author: Viarium.io
Title: [ANN][PREICO] THE FIRST VR PLATFORM FOR BUSINESS ON BLOCKCHAIN | Viarium
Body: Hello! Today is the day! VIARIUM is launching a competition dedicated to the release of #ReadyPlayerOne movie. As we wrote earlier events of the movie unfold in 2044, so we decided to give each winner VIARIUM tokens at a rate equivalent to 2044 rubles. The probability of winning is very high, because we decided to have as many as 100 winners. Aside from that, we have a GRAND PRIZE: a virtual reality tour. This is not a movie anymore, this is an existing present. The winners will be chosen by a draw, which is the most fair way for all participants to have equal chances to win. The rules are very simple: subscribed to our Telegram channel (https://t.me/viariumen) make a repost of this announcement on any of your social networks (Instagram, facebook, vk, twitter) fill in your Telegram nickname and repost from your social network in the form below. We will sum up the results on 2nd of April. Good luck to all participants! And get #ReadyPlayerOne! You‚Äôll find all the links in the description.  ‚ö°üí•üî•Facebook ‚û° https://www.facebook.com/ViariumPlatform/videos/198553594252810/
